headline: Carrier Global (CARR): Evaluating Valuation After Earnings Beat and Expanded Share Buyback Program
summary: Carrier Global (CARR) grabbed investor attention after reporting earnings that topped estimates, even as revenue and net income slipped from last year. The company also boosted its share repurchase authorization and revised its annual sales outlook. See our latest analysis for Carrier Global. Carrier Global’s latest earnings beat and bigger buyback may have reassured investors, but the stock’s momentum has faded this year. Its share price has slipped 15.8% year-to-date, and the total...
